duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee the sales team, ensuring effective management of automotive supplier clients focused on metal parts, specifically door locking system and seating system.
Develop and maintain strategic relationships with top 30 automotive supplier companies, fostering growth and revenue generation.
Utilize extensive industry knowledge and expertise to identify market trends, customer needs, and growth opportunities within the automotive supplier sector.
Drive the development and implementation of sales strategies and initiatives to maximize business potential and market share.
Provide guidance and mentorship to the sales team, promoting professional development and performance excellence.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
